amtrak1.description: Dean and Felix had a train-themed week. One fine evening they went to the theater and watched The Polar Express, then stayed out at a restaurant past his bedtime talking about it. The next day they took the Amtrak California Zephyr train from Berkeley to Sacramento, just for fun.
amtrak1.title: Amtrak 1

amtrak2.description: Felix loves picnics.  Upon taking our seats in the train, he immediately set out the lunch that Mom packed.
amtrak2.title: Amtrak 2

amtrak3.description: The railroad museum in Sacramento was the excuse for doing the train trip.  The place was filled with train-crazed little boys.
amtrak3.title: Amtrak 3

drawing.description: Felix can actually draw figuratively. Below is a recognizable picture of a fish, a shark, and some underwater grass. After drawing the grass he said, "I drew the grass sticking all the way out of the water. <pause> I guess that means I have to draw water." So he drew the water.
drawing.title: Drawing

max.description: Playdate with schoolmate Max and his mom Beate in Tilden park.  Felix loves his ladybug umbrella and boots.  He often asks Dean to act out the part of the rain, who is supposed to get frustrated that he can't soak Felix.
max.title: Max

milo1.description: Milo can sit just fine, but he doesn't have nearly the interest in it that Felix did at the same age.  Instead, he wants to crawl in the worst way.
milo1.title: Milo 1

milo2.description: Happy to be allowed in the kitchen.
milo2.title: Milo 2

milo3.description: Locomotion!  Milo began to crawl this week, driven by a burning desire to lay hands on Felix's stuff.   Felix's space ship probably made Milo crawl weeks earlier than he would have otherwise.
milo3.title: Milo 3

milo4.description: At first, Milo pushed himself along on his face.  A few days later he figured out a more dignified elbow-first way of crawling.
milo4.title: Milo 4

monterey1.description:
The Frasers took an overnight trip with us to Monterey to see the aquarium. It's got to be the best aquarium in the world.
Left to right: Dean, Felix, Evan, Janice, Jason.
monterey1.title: Monterey 1

monterey2.description: Felix checks out a passing shark.
monterey2.title: Monterey 2

monterey3.description: Janice and Evan get cozy waiting for lunch.
monterey3.title: Monterey 3

monterey5.description: Milo is spending more time in the Bjorn and less time in the sling because he really enjoys kicking his legs.
monterey5.title: Monterey 5

new_year1.description: Evan spent New Year's eve with us.
new_year1.title: New Year 1

new_year2.description: We rung out the old year playing risque games of chance and skill, like Lucky Ducks.  This, in fact, was the first actual game-in-a-box that Felix ever played.
new_year2.title: New Year 2

new_year3.description: If Dean doesn't get his pre-bedtime rowdy session, he gets cranky.
new_year3.title: New Year 3

thank_yous.description: 'Tis the season of thank you cards.
thank_yous.title: Thank Yous

description:
Happy New Year!

There was an abundance of Moses togetherness this week because noone had work or school. We took trips to various parts of California and had lots of play dates.

Milo wasn't sitting on his butt, either: he rolled right around to his stomach and started crawling. Here's a video of it:
title: January 2
